ThingDef.label: ironhusk beetle egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: Unfertilized ironhusk beetle egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Actually, it's a beetle egg, it is disgusting either way...

ThingDef.label: ironhusk beetle egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized ironhusk beetle egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Actually, it's a beetle egg, it is disgusting either way... If all goes well, it should hatch into an ironhusk beetle.

ThingDef.description: Unfertilized blizzarisk egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Actually, it's a spider egg, it is disgusting either way...

ThingDef.label: blizzarisk egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized blizzarisk egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Actually, it's a spider egg, it is disgusting either way... If all goes well, it should hatch into a blizzarisk.

ThingDef.label: charged blizzarisk egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized blizzarisk egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked. Actually, it's a spider egg, it is disgusting either way... If all goes well, it should hatch into a blizzarisk. This egg seems to be developing at an alarmingly accelerated rate!

ThingDef.label: nightling egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: Fertilized nightling egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby nightling. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
